title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the easiest way to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other open LLMs locally on macOS, Linux and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: Built-in LangChain integration; swap Ollama models into any chain or agent with one line.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; folders, personas, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop GUI for Ollama; cross-platform, single executable, no browser needed.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) for chatting, model search and download; built with Go and Bubble Tea.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; synchronous & async clients, Spring Boot starter included.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; supports streaming, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent query builder and Artisan commands for Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET Standard 2.0 client for Ollama; NuGet package with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify orchestration platform plugin that registers Ollama as a local model provider for no-code LLM apps.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; 50-line Python example.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels/DMs with mention-triggered replies.

title: ollama-macos-swiftui
summary: Native macOS SwiftUI menu-bar app for chatting with Ollama; drag-and-drop model files.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a side-panel chat and template commands powered by local Ollama models.
